name: Calorie Commando Spinach Artichoke Dip
ingredients: 8 oz. reduced fat cream cheese, softened
instructions: Squeeze liquid from spinach, place in food processor with sour cream, Parmesan, 1/2 c. mozzarella, garlic, pepper and hot sauce.
Place in 1 qt. baking dish, top with remaining mozzarella, and artichokes.
I used half a box of spinach, but you could probably skip it if you donâ€™t  like spinach.
Just mix all the other ingredients together and bake, you can probably skip the food processor.
